title: Enchanting Zircon Kada Bangles - Radiance in Gold
features: Elegant Kada Bangles featuring a minimalist design with symmetrically placed CZ stones. The bangles offer an open setting to allow the brilliance of the stones to shine through. Smooth edges ensure comfortable wear. Features a contemporary design with traditional gold.
occasions: Contemporary Weddings. Suitable for modern women who appreciate a touch of tradition.
description: Lightweight and comfortable for daily wear, adding a touch of sparkle to any outfit. Crafted with high-quality materials and Hyderabadi polish for enduring shine. Modern design blending seamlessly with traditional South Indian aesthetics. A perfect gift for a loved one or a stylish addition to your own collection.
